keyMoments.title: Kuzan Freezes Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Kuzan uses his ice powers to instantly freeze Doflamingo, demonstrating the continued mastery of his Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Kuzan's ice powers remain formidable even after leaving the Marines, and that he's willing to use them to protect others.

description: The Hie Hie no Mi allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will. In this episode, Kuzan uses it to freeze Doflamingo in an instant.

keyMoments.title: Peto Peto no Mi Debut
keyMoments.description: The Peto Peto no Mi makes its first appearance when Breed shows up at the end of the episode, though the fruit is not named yet.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces an anime-original Devil Fruit that will be the focus of the Caesar Retrieval filler arc.

abilitiesRevealed.description: The fruit appears to allow Breed to control or influence large sea creatures, as he is seen riding one.

description: An anime-only Devil Fruit that allows the user to control living creatures by placing green gel-like collars on them. The fruit's abilities are only hinted at in this episode and fully revealed in episode 626.
